titleStmt.title: Sterling P. White v. Territory of Washington. Bill of Costs

bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. Sterling P. White. Bill of Costs
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: Clerks Fees~ R. Strobach, Deputy

Costs in hearing writ of Habeas Corpus before Judge Turner at Chambers at Spokane

To guarding prisoner 45 days @ $2.00
There being no jail in Lincoln County, and no order having been made by the court where to confine prisoners from said county 90.00
